messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] another  unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/4/2004 7:00:01 PM Central Standard Time, ... It was awesome!  I wonder if the euphoria ever goes away?  Raging hormones, I know, but I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/4/2004 7:00:01 PM Central Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> I'm glad you had the birth you wanted, that is awesome

It was awesome! I wonder if the euphoria ever goes away? Raging hormones, I
know, but I still get all teary eyed when I think about it.

Elizabeth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: another  unschooler is born
messages.msgSnippet: Just thought I d let you know that after all my complaining our baby was born last Thursday.  Elliott William was 9 pounds, 6 ounces and the perfect
messages.messageBody:
"Just thought I'd let you know that after all my complaining our baby was born
last Thursday. Elliott William was 9 pounds, 6 ounces and the perfect
unmedicated birth!"

Aaaaawwww.....congratulations!! Welcome to the world and Happy Birthday little Elliott William.
I'm glad you had the birth you wanted, that is awesome.

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
